mapper.select: /* comment.list */ select hcmnt.hong_cmnt_uid as hong_cmnt_uid ,hcmnt.cmnt_cn as cmnt_cn ,huser.user_nm as user_nm ,huser.user_email as user_email ,hfile.file_url as profile_src ,case when hcmnt.reg_id = #{loginUser} then true else false end as can_edit from hong_cmnt hcmnt left join hong_user huser on huser.user_uid = hcmnt.reg_id left join hong_file hfile on hfile.hong_file_uid = huser.profile and hfile.del_yn = 'N' and hfile.saved = 'SAVED' where hcmnt.del_yn = 'N' and hcmnt.target_type = #{type} and hcmnt.target_uid = #{targetUid}
